articles.author: Ruby Mellen
articles.title: Despite surging renewables, fossil fuel emissions will hit record this year - The Washington Post
articles.description: Emission-rate increases will accelerate in the U.S. and E.U. but will slow in China and India, according to a report published Wednesday.
articles.content: Global carbon emissions from fossil fuels are projected to rise to an all-time high this year, with increases expected to accelerate in the United States and European Union but slow in China and Indi… [+215 chars]
